extendedInfo.description: In this family-friendly adventure game, players explore a mysterious old mansion in search of their missing grandfather. Grandpa might be missing, but his presence is everywhere. Familiar objects have been re-engineered to create puzzles for the player. Clues abound, and as each puzzle is solved, others present themselves.

reviews.comment: I love this game, and everything else this programmer has done.  Beautiful graphics, entertaining, and comfortably challenging.  5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BEST GAME EVER
reviews.comment: This is one of my favorite games.The game of it is find grandpa. I rate 5 stars. But of you want something good go get toe lost city.
reviews.author: Ash Sajib

reviews.title: Nice but short
reviews.comment: Nice graphics and sound, the puzzles were fun, and I like the theme, though the game was quite short.  If you liked this, you\'ll love \"Lost City\" by Fire Maple Games.
reviews.author: Syn Holliday

reviews.title: *SPOILER*
reviews.comment: The globe is easy look on the fridge u know the letters the code for the globe is the colours of the letters in the word \"love\" witch u find that out by turning the power to the secert room then going back to it from its alternate entrance on the door in the room a poster says \"love is the key\" or somthig and yea type in the colours and done
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Grisly manor
reviews.comment: Wtf??!! I cant fig out wat to do after i got the wrench for the secret room. I need help. Fawk
reviews.author: Roxy Austin

reviews.title: Too short
reviews.comment: Wish this game was longer. The ending kept me asking myself \"is that it?\" The puzzles were pretty good, but the basement door wouldn\'t open even when I had solved it, I had to complete it four times. Overall, it is worth the small price.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: good but too short
reviews.comment: Yes, it has some good puzzles, but it\'s way, way too short.  Just leaves you wanting more.  But .99 cents for an hour\'s entertainment (if you don\'t get stuck, I suppose) is pretty good, relatively speaking.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I\'m stuck
reviews.comment: I need help all I have is a fish Bowl, matches, nd a torn paper with the numbers 4-15 on it.  I don\'t know what else to do. I got a wrench and opened up the secret wall but don\'t know what I need to pull the handle.  Don\'t know wat to do with the globe or the owls on the fireplace or how to open the stairs lock. Lease help me
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice graphics
reviews.comment: Great game but was very short. Beat it in an hour:( very nicely done all around I just wish it had been longer. Moto DROIDX
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Short but very fun.
reviews.comment: I finished the game in a couple of hours, but for $.99, I\'d say it\'s worth it.  The puzzles were quite good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too short.
reviews.comment: Very nicely made game with some good puzzles but it\'s just too short. I had just got warmed up when it was all over.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: After playing lost city I had fun playing this but did not expect it to be such a short mystery. Well worth the money, just know you\'re in for a short ride.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thx 4 the tips fr players.
reviews.comment: Bought it because of the buzz. Not really good at this sort of things and wish that there is at least an option for hints. I was tapping the entire screen like an idiot ^_^
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ace
reviews.comment: Great, challenging but a bit short. Try Lost Island if you like this Myst style game - it\'s much longer and more involved
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Loved it! (a little short, though)
reviews.comment: I loved the game, but I finished it in a few hours. It would be nice (especially for a paid game) if more levels (or something) could be added, perhaps picking up from the.end ...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: More, more, more!
reviews.comment: I\'ve never played a simple click and point puzzle game on my phone and so I\'m really glad I found this one. Great puzzles, but the ending was a bit open and the game was pretty short. I hope to see a sequel or more games like this one. I\'ve played The Lost City and loved it. More, more, more! Please. :)
reviews.author: Jess Drinnan

reviews.title: Fun but short
reviews.comment: Fun game but I wish itwas longer.  I solved it in just over an hour and a half.  Then again, it was only .99 cents.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: How the hell do u find anything on this game! Its rubbish and soooo boring! Waste of 73p a load of crap.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I enjoyed it
reviews.comment: Not quite the depth of their lost city game but still very enjoyable. I never really got lost just your typical running around collecting clues and items to solve puzzles. Definitely satisfying for the dollar it cost me.
reviews.author: Jo Mama

reviews.title: Amazing game!
reviews.comment: This is a superb game! Loved every minute of it! Worked perfectly on my HTC Desire HD with CM7.
reviews.author: A Google User
